name: NautilusHybridAgent
description: Hybrid trading agent combining LLM-driven market analysis with rule-based strategy execution. Features intelligent strategy selection from EMA, RSI, and Bollinger Bands strategies based on market conditions.

skills.name: Hybrid Trading (LLM + Rules)
skills.description: LLM analyzes market conditions and selects the optimal rule-based strategy (EMA/RSI/BB) for execution.
examples: Use hybrid mode to trade BTC-USDT with automatic strategy selection
Analyze market and choose between trend-following and mean reversion strategies

skills.name: Pure LLM Trading
skills.description: LLM directly analyzes market data and generates trade decisions without predefined rules.
examples: Use LLM to analyze BTC market and make trading decisions
Trade ETH-USDT with pure AI-driven decisions

skills.name: Rule-Based Trading
skills.description: Execute a fixed rule-based strategy (EMA/RSI/BB) consistently without LLM intervention.
examples: Trade BTC-USDT using EMA crossover strategy
Apply RSI mean reversion to ETH-USDT
Use Bollinger Bands reversal strategy for volatile markets

skills.name: Adaptive Strategy Switching
skills.description: In hybrid mode, dynamically switch between strategies as market conditions change.
examples: Switch from EMA to RSI when market becomes ranging
Adapt strategy based on volatility and trend strength
